channel.title: wasteland, outskirts
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "wasteland, outskirts" - a question

item.title: Re: wasteland, outskirts
item.content:encoded:
It's a good idea to finish Outskirts (if possible) in any season.

The final item you get depends on your current bloodline.
Everybody gets the same new Bloodline, Eye of the Storm.

item.title: wasteland, outskirts
item.content:encoded:
is it a good idea to have ouskirts in season 2?
because i'm going to finish of season 1 and still didn't run outskirts.
i'm a legacy ninja and in season 2 i will pick white eye.do the items and finishing bloodlines go to the legacy or the white eye?
